dialogue: {userName}, {3}, {4}, {5}, get in here now!
What's going on?
We have discovered what {20}'s plan is..
And...?
Currently, sitting in a secret location, a nuclear missile is waiting to launch
Wha-
The target: London.
He must be lying!
He isn't.
How do you know?
I didn't tell you the full reason why we had to fire {20}...
Go on..
I found out that he was attempting to build a nuclear missile behind my back. I guess he finally found the resources to build it..
I sure did.. And if my plan worked to remove this Agency from the picture, there would be nobody to even try and stop me!
And the best part about it - even though I have now told you, there is nothing you can do to stop it! The self-destruct distance is huge, and you don't even know where it is being located!
*you all leave the interrogation room and gather in the control room*
My team and I will do the best we can, but I don't think we can find it. We simply have no information to go off on!
I guess we have to prepare for the worst. Let's get some walls ready
*as soon as the words left {8}'s lips, the sound of sirens filled the room*
This is it guys! Get ready to stop that nuke!
Actually, this just seems to be a standard missile, with an self-destruct distance of {endDistance}. I guess they just want us out of the picture, we can't let that happen!
Let's get the walls!
Hey! Thats my line!
